i am unhappy. Dedicated servers favor the killer more than peer to peer servers did. Killers are constantly over-buffed and survivors are constantly nerfed. If you want to have fun, play killer. If you want to get a headache and not have fun, play survivor. Don't waste your time with this game. The game got significantly worse after dedicated servers got implemented.

Iv'e been playing this game on and off since launch. stopped playing when Huntress came out and came back shortly after Legion was released. in all my time playing iv'e seen this game only go downhill slowly. i can not recommend this game in the state it is in. i honestly can not believe that a game in this state actually costs money. this game costs $20 USD. on top of that. the devs don't listen to the player base but then add things we never asked for. they literally made the game look like a mobile game bc they thought it was a good idea. on top of that as of the time i post this review (2/15/21) the game is in such a unplayable state that playing survivor is imposable to rank up with unless you escape trials due to a bug that wont give you any points in one of the 4 categories if you die. on top of that there is a serious Dsinc for killer's to survivor's making hits count for the killer that is a literal 7 feet away from you. i HAVE been hit from around a corner bc of this bug. take what you want from this review but as i stand unless you get this game as a gift it is not worth playing rn.

Despite its flaws, I have never had a multiplayer game suck me in as much as Dead by Daylight. The premise is fun, the gameplay is overall quite good, and it features some of horror's biggest icons. That said, there is a decent learning curve and it is a grind, but stick with it and you'll get to a point where you can't put it down.

Dead by Daylight é como se você estivesse dentro de um filme de terror beem clichê... ( Aquelas coisas > Sobreviver fugindo de um killer com seus amigos, encontrar saída e etc.. É isso ou esperar pela morte KKKK.) Mas sem sombra de dúvidas acaba tornando a jogatina muito engraçada e divertida, é um game bem legal de jogar entre amigos, a experiência de você jogar como sobrevivente fugindo de um killer  é um pouco medonho mas ao mesmo tempo bem de boa, isso pelo fato que você acaba se acostumando com a pegada do game beem facilmente, a jogabilidade é perfeita e muito fluida, pra mim é uma das melhores.  Gráficos OK, dentro da média. Questão de otimização no início pecava um pouco, mas ao decorrer de vários updates arrumaram esse problema junto aos servidores e ping, agora tá 100%. Bugs, sim o jogo possui, mas nada que te impeça de jogar. Trilha sonora bem básica e padrão de terror ( Exceto quando você joga em springwood contra o Freddy Krueger ou em haddonfield contra o melhor killer, Michael Myers !!! KKKKKK). Pra mim é um dos melhores games da minha biblioteca steam, simplesmente espetacular.

I dont care what anyone says...I love this game.  It is tons of fun, especially if you can play it with friends.  Look at it for what it is...a fun escape type horror game where you can choose how you play it...whether you hide from the killer, or take a more daring approach and YOLO those generators, just enjoy it and have fun!

Es un juego muy entretenido, la mayoria de las personas que lo juegan hablan ingles, lo cual no importa mucho ya que durante la partida no se pueden comunicar por voz o texto, solo al inicio o al final de la partida, me gusta que te da la posibilidad de ganar puntos que después puedes intercambiar por mas asesinos o superviviente, claro que debes jugar mucho ya que te los dan cada ves que subes de nivel la cuenta en el juego, pienso que esta bien equilibrado entre las habilidades que tienen los supervivientes y las habilidades que tiene el asesino, yo lo recomiendo.

This is one of those games where it's fun to play, but also incredibly irritating at the same time. The developers seem to have a major interest in killers and leave the survivors on the side. At first survivors were incredibly busted, but now over time Killers definitely have the upper hand (unless if it's a Survive with friends group). They haven't changed a lot when it comes down to certain elements being out right broken (i.e killer body blocking the stairs so you're essentially trapped and they can just go afk and force you to quit if they don't feel like just killing you). It's just one of those guys that is hit or miss depending on the taste of games you have I guess.

Matchmaking can occasionally be very unbalanced and queue times can vary between a short wait (less then a minute) to very long (five plus minutes) depending on which side has the most players. Other then that, the dual nature of the game means that you will likely find something you like. I'd prefer a bundle that had all the killers at a reduced price, if they aren't on sale, I can't recommend picking them all up.

The game and its premise is very fun, yet it is dragged down heavily by how killers and survivors absolutely hate each other, the community is horrible, and along with that, the game is also buggy. Causing somebody to get stuck or a killer being unable to hear a survivor due to loud chase music or a bug in the sound design. Your fun tends to lie in the hands of the other faction as well. If you are a solo survivor going against a high rank killer with a strong killer and items/perks, you will most-likely have little fun. This is the same as killer: if you go against a high rank group who intend to mess with you and annoy you as much as possible it will be hard to have fun, going back to the community hating each other once again. Some perks and items are used much more than others, as some have a very strong use. Decisive strike, a survivor perk allowing you to get a free second chance as long as you can hit a medium-hard skill check. A killer perk such as No One Escapes Death, allowing the killer to knock survivors onto the floor in a single hit and well as giving them a speed boost at the end of the game. The game is a mixed bag, I love it and hate it. It depends on who you get put against and if the game's bugs show their faces. Just be ready for people to tell you to kill yourself and for a bug ruining a chase, and you will probably have fun. I recommend it, but I also hate this game and its very existence. Still tho its pretty fun
